content:
I've just published a new blog article Fullstack Roc + htmx - Events, which covers some of what I have learnt experimenting with lukewilliamboswell/roc-htmx-playground recently.

I started off writing some notes to share on Nested Sets in zulip, and somehow that turned into this article on htmx Events instead. :shrug:

If you have any feedback please let me know.

Also, the Nested Set thing was fun - so check that out. I'm still not 100% its a great idea, I need to experiment with queries and updates etc. But haven't gotten that far yet.
